drug.name: Licorice
drug.description: Licorice allergenic extract is used in allergenic testing.

product.name: Herbon Orange Tingle
product.labeller: Purity Life Division of SunOpta Co.

mixture.name: Complete Fortify
mixture.ingredients: Azadirachta indica leaf + Echinacea angustifolia root + Echinacea purpurea flowering top + Inula helenium root + Levomenthol + Licorice + Usnea barbata + Zanthoxylum clava-herculis whole

mixture.name: Ari Moms Care
mixture.ingredients: Angelica dahurica root + Licorice + Orange + Panax ginseng whole

mixture.name: Complete Fortify
mixture.ingredients: Azadirachta indica leaf + Echinacea angustifolia root + Echinacea purpurea flowering top + Inula helenium root + Levomenthol + Licorice + Usnea barbata + Zanthoxylum clava-herculis whole

drug-interaction.name: Torasemide
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of hypokalemia can be increased when Licorice is combined with Torasemide.
